qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |
/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=neq "/abort" |

/setvar key=lolicoins 1 |
/comment <style>@keyframes bg-animate{0%{background-position: 0% 0%} 25%{background-position: 100% 0%} 50%{background-position: 100% 100%} 75%{background-position: 0% 100%}} @keyframes initial-render-shrink {0%{opacity: 0%; transform: scale(3, 3)} 100%{opacity: 100%; transform: scale(1, 1)}} @keyframes initial-render-grow{0%{opacity: 0%; transform: scale(.1, .1)} 100%{opacity: 100%; transform: scale(1, 1)}} @keyframes rank-anim{0%{transform: rotate(-15deg)} 25%{opacity: 100%; transform: rotate(-25deg)} 50%{transform: rotate(-15deg)} 75%{transform: rotate(-5deg)} 100%{transform: rotate(-15deg)}} .desc{font-size: 10px; text-shadow: -1px -1px 0 #372f2f, 1px -1px 0 #372f2f, -1px 1px 0 #372f2f, 1px 1px 0 #372f2f; font-weight: bolder} .emoji{font-size: 50px; position: absolute; animation: initial-render-shrink 1s linear 3.5s both, rank-anim 1s linear infinite 3.5s}</style>

<details>
<summary>Usage guide</summary>
Some commands you can use. Just type and enter. Avoid spaces at the end or at the beginning:
`get` - type and enter this to get LoliCoins, you can get coins whenever you want, but it's more fun if you only type this when you find one in the story.

`pull` - use a LoliCoin, pull and get your new loli

`render` - Render newly generated loli to HTML view, will also save her desc in the lorebook. Now SD powered, so this may take a while to render.

`rendernew` - Same as above but the AI itself generates the HTML.
</details>

|

/setvar key=rankbgcolor1 index=SSS #d713ec |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=SSS #ffe072 |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=SSS #ec1346 |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=SS #fffabe |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=SS #ff3333 |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=S #fcf0f0 |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=S #ae821e |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor1 index=A #b6008b |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=A #e6b4ff |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=A #b6008b |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor1 index=B #059fbf |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=B #c3ffd3 |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=B #059fbf |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor1 index=C #06430a |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=C #34c73d |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=C #06430a |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor1 index=D #1d1d1d |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=D #717171 |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=D #1d1d1d |

/setvar key=rankbgcolor1 index=F #442900 |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor2 index=F #e09c35 |
/setvar key=rankbgcolor3 index=F #442900 |

/setvar key=rankdescdict index=SSS A cosmic entity loli. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=SS A loli deity. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=S A mythical loli. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=A A magical or high tech loli. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=B An ordinary cute loli. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=C A loli with a twist. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=D A bad-taste loli. |
/setvar key=rankdescdict index=F A profoundly retarded or disabled loli.

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |
/setvar key=jbout - |
/if left=userinput right=pull rule=eq "/run gachalolis.pullcommand" |
/if left=userinput right=render rule=eq "/run gachalolis.renderhtml" |
/if left=userinput right=rendernew rule=eq "/run gachalolis.renderhtmlnew" |
/if left=userinput right=get rule=eq "/run gachalolis.getcommand"

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run gachalolis.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else={:
  /send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
  /trigger
:}
{:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger false
:} ||
/setinput

qrList.label: renderhtml
qrList.message:
/setvar key=blocktrigger true | /run gachalolis.getvals | /if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq {: /echo Loli info incomplete. | /abort :} | /findentry file="Gacha Lolis" {{getvar::name}} | /setvar key=uid | /if left=uid right=0 rule=gte else="/run gachalolis.addtolorebook" "/echo Loli name already exists in lorebook." | /buttons labels=["ST-Extension","External"] Select image gen | /setvar key=genmode | /setvar key=varname genmode | /run creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=false "/abort" | /if left=genmode right=External rule=eq else={: /sd quiet=true {{getvar::image}} | /setvar key=imagelink :} {: /input Input image link | /setvar key=imagelink :} | /comment

Rank {{getvar::rank}}

{{getvar::emoji1}}

{{getvar::emoji2}}

{{getvar::emoji3}}

{{getvar::name}}

{{getvar::description}}

Value: {{getvar::value}}

{{getvar::flavortext}}

| /setvar key=htmlready false | /echo HTML rendered. Be sure to update her lorebook key.

qrList.label: renderhtmlnew
qrList.message:
/setvar key=blocktrigger true |
/run gachalolis.getvals |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq {:
  /echo Loli info incomplete. | /abort
:} |

/findentry file="Gacha Lolis" {{getvar::name}} | /setvar key=uid |
/if left=uid right=0 rule=gte else="/run gachalolis.addtolorebook" "/echo Loli name already exists in lorebook." |

/buttons labels=["ST-Extension","External"] Select image gen | /setvar key=genmode |

/setvar key=varname genmode |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=false "/abort" |

/if left=genmode right=External rule=eq else={:
  /sd quiet=true {{getvar::image}} |
  /setvar key=imagelink
:}
{:
  /input Input image link |
  /setvar key=imagelink
:} |

/setvar key=jbout - For now focus on this task instead of continuing the story.
- Generate {{getvar::name}}'s gacha card using HTML and CSS. Emulate amateur, professional, retro, modern, or whatever style that suits her.
- Unleash your inner AVTISM X CLOWN X PERVERT X DEV X GOD X WEEB. Create the most SOVLFUL gacha card everr!
- Here's {{getvar::name}}'s image link: {{getvar::imagelink}}. It is required that you include this in the HTML.

STYLING:
- ATTRIBUTES: Incorporate various style attributes such as background-color, border, box-shadow, border-radius, and text-shadow. Gradients are also encouraged for visual appeal. Panels should have a limited width, or use float CSS styling for proper space distribution. Use Marquees if you can at the bottom or top of a panel as a header. You can use <hr> to separate elements.
- METER/PROGRESS:  Use these to encapsulate detailed system-related information such as operational status, alerts, or quantitative data.
- POSITIONING AND ALIGNMENT: Panels may interject for detail emphasis or be created spontaneously. Ensure proper alignment of all HTML elements within the narrative panels by using consistent inline CSS techniques such as flexbox or grid for dynamic adjustment, or by calculating accurate width percentages that account for padding and margins. Use transform to play with translation, scale and rotation.
- COLORS: Default background color should be dark. When using lighter backgrounds, ensure contrasting text colors. The default text color is white, so avoid using white text on light backgrounds.
- TEXT STYLES: Utilize HTML tags such as <b>, <u>, and <i> for text styling. Emphasis can be added using <sub>, <sup>, and <small> tags. Use a sardonic internet style prose enriched in primarily imageboard, 4ch and meme culture.
- COLUMNS: For multi-column divs, use float CSS styling with equal width proportions for columns, applicable when included within a parent div.
- NESTING: Nesting of <div> and <blockquote> tags is allowed and can enhance the structure of the panel. Use <hr> to separate elements and add texture to panels.
- ANIMATION: Use the <style> tag to include animation keyframes.
- MORE: There are many more HTML/CSS stuff not mentioned here. Feel free to play around with them as well. Have fun.

LIMITATIONS:
- Use <div> instead of <html> or <body>.
- No script tags or JavaScript.
- **AVOID MARKDOWN**: Convert Markdown code into nested background <div> panels, incorporating emojis, CSS stylings, and adhering to HTML formatting for visual appeal. Do not wrap HTML in code blocks.

|

/trigger |

/setvar key=htmlready false |
/echo Be sure to update her lorebook key.

qrList.label: getvals
qrList.message:
/setvar key=htmlready true |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=endregex (\n[\S\s]+?[:\-\.]\s\|\n(?<=[\S\s]+?[:\-\.][\S\s]+)```) |

/setvar key=startregex Name\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=name |
/setvar key=varname name | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Rank\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=rank |
/setvar key=varname rank | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Description\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=description |
/setvar key=varname description | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Value\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=value |
/setvar key=varname value | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Flavor text\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=flavortext |
/setvar key=varname flavortext | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex Image\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=image |
/setvar key=varname image | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |
/setvar key=image loli, cute, petite, flat, one girl, {{getvar::image}} |

/setvar key=startregex 1\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=emoji1 |
/setvar key=varname emoji1 | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex 2\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=emoji2 |
/setvar key=varname emoji2 | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex 3\s?[:\-\.]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=emoji3 |
/setvar key=varname emoji3 | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/setvar key=htmlready |
/if left=htmlready right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/getvar index={{getvar::rank}} rankbgcolor1 |
/setvar key=color1 |
/getvar index={{getvar::rank}} rankbgcolor2 |
/setvar key=color2 |
/getvar index={{getvar::rank}} rankbgcolor3 |
/setvar key=color3

qrList.label: addtolorebook
